info.name: Doride
info.description:
DESIGN BY:
Karim Rashid

MATERIALS:
“The leaf is is a stroke of a pen, a soft vertical wave in flux, a fluid gesture that changes to vary light – a zoomorphic form that I would describe as digital nature.” Materials: steel base; structure in hydroformed metal; anti-dazzle louvre in thermoplastic material. A joint long the vertical lamp development allows a rotation until 350°, adjusting the light emission and assuming different shapes in the space. Touch dimmer placed on the stem.

INFORMATIONS:
FLUO 1x57W (GX24Q-5) - TC - TEL
